name: embodystat
author: weiku

sections.description:
This plug-in can be used to get feedback and make data analysis on search engine’s collection on your wordpress articles. For example, it offers automatic inquiry on whether an article is collected or not by baidu, Google, bing, sogou and yahoo. In particular, it provides yahoo’s feedback on external links. Besides, it offers overall percentage information of an search engine on a full article in categories, which is greatly helpful in knowing about the popularity and marketing value of your website contents overallly. More information about our team, you can visit our website http://www.weiku.com.

Readme Generator

This Readme file was generated using wp-readme, which generates readme files for WordPress Plugins.
sections.installation: Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.
